game_description: Challenge your friends or beat the bot (I dare you!) in the game of Petanque. Experience: - stunning views at different times of the day - pretty cool physics (you can spin the ball) - challenging bot - chill atmosphere
review_1: Glad I purchased this but the AI bot is very hard to beat and I don’t see a way to select its level of difficulty. Also there is no explanation i could find for the purpose of the three spinning wheels that have hieroglyphics on them.
